name: 猫肉「Cat Meat」
description: Oh noes! Meteors are raining down and your loved ones are at home alone! Race back to make sure they're safe, but be careful - cats only have 9 lives!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: 1 GHz or faster 32-bit or 64-bit processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: GPU with DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
